channel.title: How Do I Get An NPC To Say Stuff? Or Sell?
channel.description:
I am new to these private servers...i found out how to spawn the people but i dont know how to make them talk or sell stuff :( For example: Santa would usually sell rares and say: "Get your rares here!" or something like that. I have no idea how to code any of those things someone help me please :confused:
Post a mini-guide on that stuff if you like :D

item.title: How Do I Get An NPC To Say Stuff? Or Sell?

item.description:
@cocoa7 wrote:

go into the tutorial section and there are many tutorials on it or you can just put “talking NPC” into the search bar and it should give u the link to the tutorial for it…
